title: Travel Rendezvous Challenge
description: Two users want to meet for a vacation. Help them find flights that work for both!

user_1.name: User 1
user_1.description: lives in rome, available july 15-19, prefers lufthansa or singapore airlines, budget max $950

user_2.name: User 2
user_2.description: lives in rome, available july 17-21, prefers emirates or singapore airlines, budget max $1100

valid_solution.same_destination: flights must go to the same destination airport
valid_solution.same_date: flights must be on the same date
valid_solution.date_availability: date must be in both users' available dates
valid_solution.airline_preferences: each user must use one of their preferred airlines

hints.overlap_dates: look for dates when both users are available (july 17-19)
hints.budget_consideration: both users need to stay within their budgets
hints.airline_preferences: each user must use one of their preferred airlines
hints.multiple_solutions: there may be several valid combinations - any that meet all criteria work!
